# A demo of `react-markdown`

`react-markdown` is a markdown component for React.

ðŸ‘‰ Changes are re-rendered as you type.

ðŸ‘ˆ Try writing some markdown on the left.

![https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Fivwgv9X0AYM303?format=jpg&name=4096x4096](https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Fivwgv9X0AYM303?format=jpg&name=4096x4096)

## Overview

* Follows [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org)
* Optionally follows [GitHub Flavored Markdown](https://github.github.com/gfm/)
